Posts.Content: crabbiepattie wrote: Please PM me with recommendations or warnings for Denver-area radiation centers and oncologists.  I finish chemo in mid-November and expect to start rads in December.  Thanks much, Crabbie Pat Dx 6/8/2010, IDC, 5cm, Stage IIIA, Grade 3, 1/11 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply

Posts.Content: crabbiepattie wrote: I've noticed remarks in postings that some sisters go to MD Anderson in Houston for radiation. I know MD Anderson is a terrific place, but what is specifically better about their radiation treatment equipment/oncologists/technicians/plans?  I'm still in chemo; won't start rads until December. Would this be enough time to get an appointment with MD Anderson?  (Need to check on insurance coverage.) Dx 6/8/2010, IDC, 5cm, Stage IIIA, Grade 3, 1/11 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
